sentences.cn: 一家乌烟瘴气的夜总会

sentences.en: Adelson & 39 ; s dream was Macau? formerly known for its dark, seedy casinos and violent underworld.
sentences.cn: 艾德森 的梦想在澳门──先前以黑暗 、 低劣的赌场和地下暴力组织闻名的地方.
他觉得 [ 看来 ] 不舒服.

sentences.en: He found his brother in a seedy, roach-infested apartment.
sentences.cn: 他发现自己的哥哥住在一套破旧肮脏、蟑螂肆虐的公寓里。

sentences.en: He was soiled and seedy and fragrant with gin.
sentences.cn: 他衣衫褴褛、邋遢不堪,但却因杜松子酒而带有香气.

sentences.en: In films, we always see the tarot seedy parlor or back room.
sentences.cn: 在电影里, 我们经常会看到这样的场景.

sentences.en: Many North Americans are familiar with CD - ROMs, but not with seedy Roms.
sentences.cn: 很多北美人都熟悉光碟(D-ROM )但不熟悉邋遢邋遢的罗姆人(:读音一样)在欧洲,这个词有另一种意思.

sentences.en: She's looked rather seedy for the past two weeks.
sentences.cn: 最近两个星期,她面色相当难看.

sentences.en: That accounts for your always looking so seedy.
sentences.cn: 那就是你看上去总是那么没精打采的原因.

sentences.en: The book includes some memorably seedy characters and scabrous description.
sentences.cn: 这本书包含了一些难忘下流的角色及有伤风化的描述.

sentences.en: The grapes are delicious but seedy.
sentences.cn: 葡萄好吃是好吃,就是子儿太多.

sentences.en: The grapes are delicious but very seedy.
sentences.cn: 葡萄好吃是好吃,就是子儿太多.

sentences.en: The once dapper , cheerful agent had become seedy looking and bitter.
sentences.cn: 昔日风度翩翩、容光焕发的经纪人,今天变成了衣衫褛褴, 蓬头垢面的人.

sentences.en: They suck you in to their seedy world.
sentences.cn: 他们把你卷入他们肮脏糜烂的圈子里。

sentences.en: We were staying in a seedy hotel close to the red light district.
sentences.cn: 我们当时住在紧挨着红灯区的一家脏乱不堪的旅馆里。

sentences.en: You look unwell ( seedy ) , and your eyes are bloodshot.
sentences.cn: 看来你精神不好, 你的眼睛布满了血丝.

破旧；下流；没精打采；起粒

trans.tran_cn: 破烂的，多籽的，籽状的，疲倦的，粗鄙的
